lead_paragraph: The collaboration has produced a report that says “marijuana is opening up opportunities across a variety of industries.”

headline.print_headline: An Agency and High Times Ponder Pot’s Rebranding
headline.main: High Times and Agency Unite to Sell Marijuana to Mainstream

snippet: The collaboration has produced a report that says “marijuana is opening up opportunities across a variety of industries.”
abstract: Advertising column; High Times magazine and advertising agency Sparks & Honey have released report that is meant to transform way advertisers think about burgeoning legal marijuana industry; report seeks to address advertiser squeamishness about industry that stands to produce billions in revenue should it become uniformly legal.
